body: Hello i know there's been one like this in the beta but did anyone buy overwatch and plays it regularly?

title: Overwatch Players

replies.body: You can move it into Gaming Discussion folder ;)
replies.body_tagged: You can move it into Gaming Discussion folder ;)

replies.body: I play overwatch on xbox because my laptop might not handle it well. I love the game, and playing with friends is even better. You can coordinate character strategies, movements, and other things. The balancing is pretty decent for a game that came out around 2 weeks ago. Overall, it's a fun game, and I play it along with Bo3.
replies.body_tagged: I play overwatch on xbox because my laptop might not handle it well. I love the game, and playing with friends is even better. You can coordinate character strategies, movements, and other things. The balancing is pretty decent for a game that came out around 2 weeks ago. Overall, it's a fun game, and I play it along with Bo3.
